tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteManagementSystem (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
  weight DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  recycling_bin BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE waste_pickup_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    type_id INT,
    pickup_day VARCHAR(20),
    pickup_frequency VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    type_id INT,
    collection_date TIMESTAMP,
    weight_kg DECIMAL(10,2)
);
CREATE TABLE WasteTypes (id INT PRIMARY KEY, type_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, is_recyclable BOOLEAN NOT NULL)
